gov.nist.secauto.decima.xml.util

Class ExtendedXSLTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nist.secauto.decima.xml.util.XSLTransformer
      • gov.nist.secauto.decima.xml.util.ExtendedXSLTransformer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    URIResolver

    public class ExtendedXSLTransformer
extends XSLTransformer
    Provides support for XSL transformations in Decima, with support for dynamically loading XSL extensions. This guarantees that any XSL extensions are properly loaded through the TransformerExtensionService extension mechanism in the Decima framework.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ExtendedXSLTransformer()
      Constructs a new transformer that automatically registers all extension functions.
      ExtendedXSLTransformer(net.sf.saxon.jaxp.SaxonTransformerFactory transformerFactory)
      Constructs a new transformer that automatically registers all extension functions using the provided SaxonTransformerFactory.
